Constructor Detail

SchemaInstaller

public SchemaInstaller(java.lang.String schemaLocation,
                       java.lang.String dbUrl,
                       java.lang.String dbUser,
                       java.lang.String dbPass)
Creates a new SchemaInstaller in order to install the system database schema.

Parameters:
schemaLocation - the path, where the schema file exists
host - the database host
port - the port of the database host (usually 3306)
dbName - the name of the database to use
dbUser - the user of the database schema
dbPass - the password for the user

SchemaInstaller

public SchemaInstaller(java.lang.String databaseName,
                       java.lang.String schemaLocation,
                       java.lang.String dbUrl,
                       java.lang.String dbUser,
                       java.lang.String dbPass,
                       boolean create)
Creates a new SchemaInstaller in order to install the system database schema.

Parameters:
databaseName - the name of the database to be created
schemaLocation - the path, where the schema file exists
host - the database host
port - the port of the database host (usually 3306)
dbName - the name of the database to use
dbUser - the user of the database schema
dbPass - the password for the user
Method Detail

doInstall

public boolean doInstall()
Starts the installation.
